name: kennel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(US usually doghouse) a small, usually wooden, shelter for a dog to sleep in outside
IanDikhtiar/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
US (UK kennels) a place where people leave their dogs to be taken care of while they are away, or a place where dogs are bred: US We left our dog at the kennel when we went away.UK We left our dog in kennels when we went away.
